BATwinsMod:BurnPower.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, deal
damage, then decrease the amount by 1. Upon death, deal damage to other enemies equal to twice the amount.

DESCRIPTIONS: After alternating between playing MomoiCard and MidoriCard in battle,the damage dealt by the cards this turn and the block of gian increase

MomoiCard
MidoriCard
ColorLess
Curses
OtherCard

BATwinsMod:ArtPolishingPower.NAME: Art polishing
DESCRIPTIONS: When applying a status effect, apply to the target
poison. This effect does not trigger due to this power

BATwinsMod:GainTENextTurnPower.NAME: Next turn's energy(MOMOI)
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn gain
MOMOI Energy.

BATwinsMod:GainLENextTurnPower.NAME: Next turn's energy(MIDORI)
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn gain
MIDORI Energy.

BATwinsMod:ArtPolishingExchangePower.NAME: Art polishing(Exchage)
DESCRIPTIONS: When applying a status effect, apply to the target
burn. This effect does not trigger due to this power.

BATwinsMod:OnceMorePower.NAME: Once More
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, trigger burn on all enemies.

BATwinsMod:OnceMoreExchangePower.NAME: Once More (Exchange)
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, trigger poison on all enemies.

BATwinsMod:BugFixPower.NAME: 漏洞修复
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，抽牌堆随机
张状态牌或诅咒牌消耗，若消耗的是漏洞，则获得1力量和1敏捷.

BATwinsMod:ExperiencePower.NAME: Experience
DESCRIPTIONS:
When playing a MOMOI or MDIORI card, gain experience points equal to its energy cost.
Current: LV

)
Card's damage and block increase by the level number.
Level Up!!

BATwinsMod:SinglePlayerGamePower.NAME: Single Player Game
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a card, if your hand contains only one color, gain
block.

BATwinsMod:CoolingTimePower.NAME: Next Turn Addition to Hand
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next turn, add
to your hand (unless exhausted).

BATwinsMod:DoubleExperiencePower.NAME: Double Experience
DESCRIPTIONS: Experience gained is doubled.

BATwinsMod:DefensiveCounterattackPower.NAME: 防守与打击
DESCRIPTIONS: 受到攻击时，对攻击的怪物打出
张打击.

BATwinsMod:DefensiveCounterattackExchang.NAME: 防守与打击(交换)
DESCRIPTIONS: 受到攻击时，对攻击的怪物打出
张打击.

BATwinsMod:NormalAttackMethodsPower.NAME: 平A流
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始从抽牌堆将
张打击牌加入手牌.那张牌变为共有

BATwinsMod:NoramlAttackAuxiliaryPower.NAME: 平A辅助
DESCRIPTIONS: 平A流将打击牌加入手牌时，若抽牌堆打击牌数量不足，则进行1次洗牌.

BATwinsMod:SeeYouHaveASharenPower.NAME: Each to their own!
DESCRIPTIONS: The next
single-target attack cards played this turn will hit all enemies once.

BATwinsMod:ReadingDocumentsPower.NAME: Instant Save
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards played with effects in this battle will return to the draw pile.

BATwinsMod:ShufflePower.NAME: End-of-Turn Shuffle
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, shuffle the discard pile into the draw pile.

BATwinsMod:IntegratingAndIntegratingPowe.NAME: Integrated Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: When playing a card with an energy cost greater than 1 after exchanging, add %d cards of the original color to your hand, and apply Ethereal and Exhaust.

BATwinsMod:MasterCraftsmanshipPower.NAME: Mastering All
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, exchange up to %d cards. When exchanging cards in this battle, upgrade the cards.

BATwinsMod:BorrowMePower.NAME: Borrow Me
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, all cards are considered BATwinsMod:Shared.

BATwinsMod:MaidFormPower.NAME: Maid Form
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing the %dth card each turn, play a card with the same energy cost as an Accelerate.

BATwinsMod:FlatFallPower.NAME: Flat Fall
DESCRIPTIONS: You can only play %d more attack cards this turn.

BATwinsMod:ExpansionMagazinePower.NAME: 扩容弹夹
DESCRIPTIONS: 本场战斗存储的子弹升级.
